sense.gloss: to urge, to encourage, to press, to prompt, to draw (attention to)
to stimulate (e.g. growth), to hasten (e.g. development), to quicken, to accelerate, to promote

sdata.j: タトエバ・コーパスの↑間違↑↓まちが↓いを↑減↑↓へ↓らす↑一↑↓ひと↓つの↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓は、↑母国↑↓ぼこく↓↑語↑↓ご↓へのみ↑翻訳↑↓ほんやく↓するよう|↑促↑↓うなが↓す|ことだろう。
sdata.e: One way to lower the number of errors in the Tatoeba Corpus would be to encourage people to only translate into their native languages.
